text: Eugenio Derbez (born Eugenio Gonz√°lez Derbez; September 2, 1961 in Mexico City, Mexico) is an Mexican television actor. He created the television series of XHDRBZ, Vecinos, and La familia P. Luche. Derbez is also a Formula Three Auto racing driver. In 2013, Derbez made his director debut in the comedy- drama movie Instructions Not Included. Derbez also starred in American comedies such as How to Be a Latin Lover (2017), Overboard (2018) and The Nutcracker and the Four Realms (2018). ==References== ==Other websites== * Eugenio Derbez bio, in Spanish * Category:1961 births Category:Living people Category:Mexican movie actors Category:Mexican television actors Category:Mexican voice actors Category:Mexican television presenters Category:Television writers Category:Mexican movie directors Category:Mexican screenwriters Category:Actors from Mexico City
title: Eugenio Derbez
